document_notes.text:
This update for poppler fixes the following issues: 

Security issues fixed:
- CVE-2015-8868: Corrupted PDF file can corrupt heap, causing DoS (bsc#976844)

notes.text: Heap-based buffer overflow in the ExponentialFunction::ExponentialFunction function in Poppler before 0.40.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory corruption and crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via an invalid blend mode in the ExtGState dictionary in a crafted PDF document.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
